meanings.sent1: The mud was squelchiest after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Her squelchiest shoes were perfect for the wet ground.
meanings.sent3: The squelchiest noise came from the old sponge being squeezed.
meanings.sent4: The squelchiest sound of the swamp echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The squelchiest sound of the mud underfoot was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: He was known as the squelchiest in the group.
meanings.sent2: The squelchiest of all the puddles was right by the door.
meanings.sent3: The squelchiest always had the best stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: She was the squelchiest of them all, always ready for an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The squelchiest in the class was also the most fun to be around.
